message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is my bottom line. This product is highly sought after, and I'm confident in its value.  If you're unable to meet that, I understand, but I'm not willing to go any lower.
